title: FS:T206 Elberfeld & Charles orange color SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:T206 Elberfeld & Charles orange color SOLD
posts.post_content:
Elberfeld Orange background
Charles Orange stripes/cuffs.
Both for SOLD

Paypal delivered.  Also looking for miscuts & other errors to trade.

[IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8505/8475180496_4133d22969_c.jpg[/IMG]

Nice Elberfeld Chris! Very, very rare to see this card with the orange variation....
